OUTLINE : Patients receive doxorubicin IV day 1 every 2 week 3 course . After 3 week rest , patient receive docetaxel IV 1 hour day 1 every 2 week 3 course . Filgrastim ( G-CSF ) administer subcutaneously day 3-10 doxorubicin docetaxel course . Within 6 week completion neoadjuvant chemotherapy , patient undergo surgery mastectomy lumpectomy axillary lymph node dissection . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 45 patient accrue study within 5 year .
